facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population below international poverty line (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population living below the extreme poverty line declined from 78.2 % in 1992 to 44.5% in 2014.

facts.seriesTitle: Employed population below international poverty line, by sex and age (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2014, 41.3 % of the country's workers and their families were living on less than 1.90 US dollars per person per day

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population living below the national poverty line (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of population living below the national poverty line was 44.5 % in 2014.

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with legislative and/or regulatory provisions been made for managing disaster risk (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2015 , Niger has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Prevalence of undernourishment (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population suffering from hunger was 14.4 % in 2016 .

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children moderately or severely stunted (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, 42.2 % of children under age 5 had stunted growth

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children moderately or severely overweight (%)
facts.fact_text: The share of overweight children under age 5 increased from 1.6 % in 2000 to 3.0% in 2012.

facts.seriesTitle: Maternal mortality ratio
facts.fact_text: The maternal mortality ratio decreased from 873 per 100,000 live births in 1990 to 553 per 100,000 live births in 2015 .

facts.seriesTitle: Under-five mortality rate, by sex (deaths per 1,000 live births)
facts.fact_text: The mortality rate of children under age 5 fell from 223.7 per 1,000 live births in 2000 to 84.5 per 1,000 live births in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Number of new HIV infections per 1,000 uninfected population, by sex and age (per 1,000 uninfected population)
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , there were about 0.08 people in every 100,000 uninfected population that became newly infected with HIV.

facts.seriesTitle: Mortality rate attributed to cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease (probability)
facts.fact_text: The risk of dying between the ages of 30 and 70 from one of four main non-communicable diseases (NCDs) - cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease - was 20 % in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Participation rate in organized learning (one year before the official primary entry age), by sex (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 21.85282 % of children participated in pre-primary or primary education in the year prior to the official entrance age for primary school

facts.seriesTitle: Gender parity index for achievement in mathematics, by education level (ratio)
facts.fact_text: Gender parity index for achievement in mathematics at the end of primary education was 0.67521 in 2014 , meaning 67.521 girls per 100 boys achieved at least a minimum proficiency level in mathematics.

facts.seriesTitle: Gender parity index for achievement in reading, by education level (ratio)
facts.fact_text: Gender parity index for achievement in reading at the end of primary education was 0.84573 in 2014 , meaning 84.573 girls per 100 boys achieved at least a minimum proficiency level in reading.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of women aged 20-24 years who were married or in a union before age 18 (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2012, 76.3 % of women aged 20 to 24 reported that they were married before their eighteenth birthday

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of seats held by women in national parliaments (% of total number of seats)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of seats held by women in single or lower houses of parliament increased from 1.2048 % in 2000 to 16.9591% in 2018.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population using safely managed sanitation services, by urban/rural (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2015, 8.53216 % of the population used a "safely managed" sanitation service - a basic facility that safely disposes of human waste

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with access to electricity, by urban/rural (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population with access to electricity increased from 6.48 % in 2000 to 16.22% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , less than 5 % of the population relied primarily on clean fuels and technology.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita, by type of raw material (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption was approximately 3.41484 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Unemployment rate, by sex and age (%)
facts.fact_text: The total unemployment rate was 0.3 % in 2011.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita (%)
facts.fact_text: The annual growth rate of real gross domestic product (GDP) per capita increased from -6.06 % in 2000 to 0.97% in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP (kilogrammes of CO2 per constant 2010 United States dollars)
facts.fact_text: The carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP increased from 0.08 kilograms in 2000 to 0.11 kilograms in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 92.00 % of the population was in range of at least a second-generation (2G) cellular signal

facts.seriesTitle: Labour share of GDP, comprising wages and social protection transfers (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2010, 16.0 % of GDP was from labour, comprising wages and social protection transfers

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of urban population living in slums (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the urban population living in slums declined from 83.6 % in 1990 to 70.1% in 2014.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual mean levels of fine particulate matter in cities, urban population (micrograms per cubic meter)
facts.fact_text: In 2016 , the annual population-weighted average mean concentration of fine suspended particles of less than 2.5 microns in diameters (PM2.5) was about 70.8042831420898 micrograms per cubic metre . This is above the maximum level for safety set by WHO of 10 micrograms per cubic metre.

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with legislative and/or regulatory provisions been made for managing disaster risk (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2015 , Niger has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita, by type of raw material (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption was approximately 3.41484 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with legislative and/or regulatory provisions been made for managing disaster risk (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2015 , Niger has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Forest area as a proportion of total land area (%)
facts.fact_text: Land area covered by forest declined from 1.04839 % in 2000 to 0.90156% in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of Freshwater Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (%)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of freshwater key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 45.32331 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of Terrestrial Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (%)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 46.32463 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population, by sex (victims per 100,000 population)
facts.fact_text: In 2012 , the intentional homicide rate was 4.44 per 100,000 population .

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children under 5 years of age whose births have been registered with a civil authority (% of children under 5 years of age)
facts.fact_text: In 2012 , there were about 63.9 % of children under age 5 whose births were registered with a civil authority

facts.seriesTitle: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services (%)
facts.fact_text: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services was 6.31 % in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Fixed Internet broadband subscriptions per 100 inhabitants, by speed (per 100 inhabitants)
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , fixed-broadband internet penetration reached 0.04 % of the population , up from nearly no coverage in 2004 .

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with national statistical plans that are fully funded (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2018 , Niger does not have national statistical plans that are fully funded.
